        <general>

            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_9f7d9f11c9fdcabb46b8a962d0d1a692707192e9</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The boiling of water and the melting of an aluminium pan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Kochen des Wassers und das Schmelzen einer 
Aluminiumwanne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'ébullition de l'eau et la fonte d'une casserole
d'aluminium</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ferver da água e o derretimento de uma bandeja do
alumínio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'ebollizione dell'acqua e la fusione di una 
vaschetta dell'alluminio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Να βράσει του ύδατος και η τήξη μιας πανοραμικής 
λήψης αλουμινίου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El hervir del agua y el derretir de una cacerola 
del aluminio</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates that, when placed over gas flames of the same temperature, an aluminium pan melts when it is empty but does not do so when there is water in it.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">boiling point</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gas flame</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">melting point</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß, wenn plazierte 
Übergasflammen der gleichen Temperatur, eine Aluminiumwanne schmilzt,
wenn sie aber leer ist, nicht so tut, wenn es Wasser in ihm gibt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration démontre que, quand les 
flammes finies placées de gaz de la même température, une casserole
d'aluminium fond quand elle est vide mais ne fait pas ainsi quand il y
a l'eau dans elle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra que, quando as flamas 
excedentes colocadas da mesma temperatura, uma bandeja do gás do 
alumínio derretem quando está vazia mas não faz assim quando há 
água nela.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostra che, quando le 
fiamme eccessive disposte della stessa temperatura, una vaschetta del 
gas dell'alluminio si fonde quando è vuota ma non fa così quando ci 
è acqua in esso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση καταδεικνύει ότι, όταν πέρα από 
τοποθετείται αέριο τις φλόγες της ίδιας θερμοκρασίας, μια 
πανοραμική λήψη αλουμινίου λειώνει όταν είναι κενή αλλά δεν 
κάνει έτσι όταν υπάρχει ύδωρ σε την.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración demuestra que, cuando las llamas
excesivas colocadas de la misma temperatura, una cacerola del gas del 
aluminio derriten cuando es vacía pero no hace tan cuando hay agua en
ella.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Siedepunkt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gasflamme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schmelzpunkt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
